page.title: 08Hunter Smith - Butcher
page.content: The butcher's shop is situated at the centre of Baltasound at the head of the Voe.It is the only one on the island.They are open from half past nine to half past five which includes a dinner hour.They have quite a lot of after hours work which is from seven o'clock a.m.to nine o'clock p.m.it is just preparation.The busiest day is Saturday,the busiest time of year is Winter.There isn't enough work for two but just a bit much for one.They started the business in 1981.Pork sells alright,everyone likes beef but it is so expensive.Lamb doesn't sell very well as everyone has their own. The job just involves butchery, doing their own slaughter and cutting up the meat. Some meat comes in from Aberdeen. It is different on an island than in a city as there is a bigger range of customers in a city.
